dcterms:description: A dataset constructed from MatterPort3D that provides authentic ground truth amodal segmentation masks for partially occluded objects in real images, consisting of a variety of object categories and labels.
dcterms:title: MP3D-Amodal

dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic amodal segmentation that builds on the COCO dataset, providing ground truth annotations for occluded object parts.
dcterms:title: COCOA
